synopsis.text: Aki, Hana, Tsugumi, and Ringo are four girls with a shared dream: to create Japan's number one manga magazine, Monthly Comic Earth Star. Despite their lack of experience in manga editing, they are determined to make it happen. The enthusiastic Hana leads the team as editor-in-chief, while the cynical Aki serves as her assistant. Together with the food-loving Tsugumi and the otaku Ringo, they navigate the challenges of the manga industry. From finding mangaka to work with to perfecting their typesetting, the girls face numerous obstacles. However, their love for manga and their unwavering perseverance keep them going. This is the story of their daily struggles and triumphs as they strive to achieve their dream.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
